textBeforeTable: Flat view Next unread Next Previous First Parent Forum Complain Reply   Reply with quote   He's talking about Panasonic's new depth from defocusing (DFD) refinement to contrast detect AF.  So far it only exists in the GH4 and it only supports Panasonic lenses.  Of course Olympus lenses AF at least as well on the GH4 as they did on the GH3 and other Panny bodies. http://www.seanet.com/~hinkey/Signature6.jpg If they are m43 lenses by all means Panasonic will support these lenses - i.e., they will work just fine on a Panasonic m43 body.
